Hi, GMPL Opportunity Association named '{!GMPL_Opportunity__c.Name}' has been submitted for your approval. Please review and Approve/Reject the GMPL Opportunity Association for further action by Team members. The GMPL Opportunity Association can be Approved/Rejected via {!ApprovalRequest.External_URL}.
Thanks.
